DOC.brief_summary: A monocenter pilot study on the acceptability and feasibility of a functional MRI protocol in children with NF1 with or without reading disabilities.
DOC.brief_title: Functional Imaging and Reading Deficit in Children With NF1
DOC.detailed_description: The principal aim of the study is to highlight the activation of brain area involved phonological and visuo-spatial processing in children with NF1 with or without reading disabilities.
